Aegis.card_desc: [Shield] Your Shield has an infinite Duration and the Cooldown is reduced by 2s.

Brand.card_desc: [Fireball] Hitting enemies with Fireball heals you for {scale=100|100} Health

Cavalier.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=150|150}.

Dire Need.card_desc: [Shield] Gain {scale=5|5}% Movement Speed while using Shield.

Fearless Leader.card_desc: [Armor] Eliminations reduce all active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}%

Formidable.card_desc: [Armor] Regenerate 55% of your maximum Health over 3s when you fall below 40% of your maximum Health.

Heat Transfer.card_desc: [Shield] Every 1000 Damage your shield takes reduces the cooldown of Charge by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Hot Pursuit.card_desc: [Fireball] Hitting Fireball increases your movement speed by {scale=8|8}% for 3s.

Immovable Object.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing from other players.

Incinerate.card_desc: [Fireball] Reduce the cooldown of Fireball by {scale=0.6|0.6}s

Last Stand.card_desc: [Shield] While Shield is active and you are below 40% Health, you heal {scale=100|100} Health each second until you reach 40% Health.

Launch.card_desc: [Charge] Increase the distance of Charge by {scale=12|12}%

Looks That Kill.card_desc: [Fireball] Hitting an enemy with Fireball recharges {scale=20|20} ammo.

Pyre.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your maximum ammo capacity by {scale=10|10}.

Running Start.card_desc: [Charge] Gain {scale=10|10}% movement speed for 3s after using Charge.

Safe Travel.card_desc: [Charge] Gain a {scale=150|150} damage Shield for 3s after you Charge.

Scorch.card_desc: [Fireball] Fireball deals 45% more damage for each subsequent target hit after the first.

Towering Barrier.card_desc: [Shield] Reduce the cooldown of Shield by {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

\u00c4gis.card_desc: [Schild] Dein Schild währt ewig. Seine Abklingzeit wird um 2s reduziert.

Beeindruckend.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du unter 40% Gesundheit, regenerierst du über 3s 55% deiner maximalen LP.

Brandmarken.card_desc: [Feuerball] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Feuerball, wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Brandspuren.card_desc: [Feuerball] Jedem nachfolgend von Feuerball getroffenen Ziel wird 45% mehr Schaden zugefügt.

Entz\u00fcnden.card_desc: [Feuerball] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Feuerball um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Fliegender Start.card_desc: [Ansturm] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Verwendung von Ansturm 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Gewaltige Barriere.card_desc: [Schild] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schild um {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Kavalier.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

Letztes Gefecht.card_desc: [Schild] Bei aktivem Schild und unter 40% Gesundheit wirst du {scale=100|100} LP pro Sekunde geheilt, bis 40% Gesundheit erreicht sind.

Mutiger Anf\u00fchrer.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=10|10}%.

Schreckliche Not.card_desc: [Schild] Erhöht dein Lauftempo bei aktivem Schild um {scale=5|5}%.

Sichere Reise.card_desc: [Ansturm] Gewährt nach Ansturm 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=150|150} LP.

Starres Objekt.card_desc: [Rüstung] Unter 50% Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung von anderen Spielern.

Starter.card_desc: [Ansturm] Erhöht die Weite von Ansturm um {scale=12|12}%.

Verfolgungsjagd.card_desc: [Feuerball] Treffer mit Feuerball erhöhen dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

W\u00e4rme\u00fcbertragung.card_desc: [Schild] Immer wenn dein Schild 1000 Schaden erleidet, wird die Abklingzeit von Ansturm um {scale=0.5|0.5}s reduziert.

Allonge.card_desc: [Charge] La distance de Charge augmente de {scale=12|12}%.

Barri\u00e8re imposante.card_desc: [Bouclier de siège] Bouclier de siège se recharge {scale=0.8|0.8}s plus vite.

Beaut\u00e9 ravageuse.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Toucher un ennemi avec Boule de feu redonne {scale=20|20} munitions.

Besoin urgent.card_desc: [Bouclier] Pendant Bouclier, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

Carboniser.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Boule de feu inflige 45% de dégâts de plus par cible touchée après la première.

Chef intr\u00e9pide.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Dernier combat.card_desc: [Bouclier] Si Bouclier est actif et que votre santé est inférieure à 40%, vous regagnez {scale=100|100} PV/s jusqu'à avoir 40% de santé.

\u00c9gide.card_desc: [Bouclier] Votre Bouclier n'expire pas et son temps de recharge est de 2s.

Flambeau.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Toucher un ennemi avec Boule de feu rend {scale=100|100} PV.

Force irr\u00e9sistible.card_desc: [Charge] Charge inflige un recul de {scale=800|200} unités.

Inamovible.card_desc: [Armure] En-dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus en provenance des coéquipiers.

Incin\u00e9rer.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Boule de feu se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Invincible.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en-dessous de 40% de PV redonne 55% des PV max. en 3s.

Longueur d'avance.card_desc: [Charge] Pendant 3s après Charge, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Poursuite ardente.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Toucher un ennemi avec Boule de feu augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 3s.

Transfert thermique.card_desc: [Bouclier] Le temps de recharge de Charge est réduit de {scale=0.5|0.5}s par tranche de 1000 dégâts subis par votre bouclier.

Voyage s\u00fbr.card_desc: [Charge] Après Charge, vous obtenez un bouclier de {scale=150|150} PV qui dure 3s.

\u4e0d\u52a8\u5982\u5c71.card_desc: [护甲] 获得{scale=14|14}%的控制抗性和减速抗性

\u51b2\u523a\u8d77\u8dd1.card_desc: [冲锋] 使用冲锋后你将获得{scale=10|10}%移动速度加成，持续3秒

\u575a\u6301\u4e0d\u61c8.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 当你的生命值在守护壁垒激活的情况下低于40%时，你将每秒得到{scale=100|100} 点治疗直到生命值回复到40%

\u5854\u76fe\u58c1\u5792.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 增加{scale=500|500}点护盾生命值

\u5b89\u5168\u65c5\u884c.card_desc: [冲锋] 冲锋后获得{scale=150|150}点伤害护盾，持续3秒

\u5f15\u71c3.card_desc: [火球喷射] 减少火球喷射的冷却时间{scale=10|10}%

\u65e0\u60e7\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [冲锋] 冲锋将造成强度为{scale=800|200}的击退效果

\u65e0\u754f\u9886\u8896.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌方时所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=10|10}%

\u706b\u901f\u6551\u63f4.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 使用守护壁垒时移动速度提升{scale=5|5}%。

\u70c8\u7130\u9a91\u58eb.card_desc: [火球喷射] 火球喷射的伤害提高30%，且命中多个目标时，每个后续目标受到的伤害依次提高30%

\u70d9\u5370.card_desc: [火球喷射] 火球喷射会使目标受到的治疗效果降低{scale=15|15}%，持续3秒

\u70ed\u4f20\u5bfc.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 你的护盾每受到1000伤害，冲锋的冷却时间就减少{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u70ed\u529b\u8ffd\u8e2a.card_desc: [火球喷射] 火球喷射命中敌人将使你的移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续2秒

\u795e\u5723\u62a4\u76fe.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 守护壁垒持续时间无限，冷却时间降低至12秒

\u8363\u8000\u51fb\u6740.card_desc: [火球喷射] 火球喷射命中敌人时，回复{scale=20|20}发弹药

\u9a91\u58eb\u5c0a\u4e25.card_desc: [护甲] 在生命值低于40%时，会在3秒内回复最大生命值的55%

\u9a91\u58eb\u7cbe\u795eI.card_desc: [护甲] 增加你的基础生命值上限{scale=150|150}点

Dire Need.card_desc: [Shield] Allies within 30 units gain a 200 damage Shield for five seconds when you activate your Shield.

Evolve.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by 15%

Field Dressing.card_desc: [Armor] While standing near an objective, you spawn a HP Drop every 5s that heals for 100.

Heat Transfer.card_desc: [Shield] Every 400 Damage your shield takes reduces the cooldown of fireball by 1s.

Hot Pursuit.card_desc: [Fireball] Hitting an enemy with fireball increases your movement speed by 10% for 3s.

Immovable Object.card_desc: [Armor] Gain {25}% knockback reduction when on the Objective.

Last Stand.card_desc: [Shield][+20% Per Rank] While Shield is active you reduce the duration of all Damage Over Time effects by {40/60/80/100}%.

Launch.card_desc: [Charge] Increase the distance of Charge by 25%.

Looks That Kill.card_desc: [Fernando] Hitting an enemy with Fireball recharges {10}% of your maximum ammo.

Pyre.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce the ammo cost of firing your flame lance by 15%.

Running Start.card_desc: [Armor] You gain 15% Movement Speed for 3s upon dismounting. 45s Cooldown.

Safe Travel.card_desc: [Charge] Gain a 200 damage Shield for 5s after you Charge.

Towering Barrier.card_desc: [Shield] Increase the size of Shield by 75% and increases its Health by 300.

Buen viaje.card_desc: [Carga] Obtienes un escudo de {scale=150|150} puntos de protección durante 3 s tras cargar.

Caballero.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud base máxima aumenta en {scale=150|150}.

Desmonte veloz.card_desc: [Carga] Ganas {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 3s tras usar Carga.

Formidable.card_desc: [Armadura] Regeneras un 55% de tu salud máxima durante 3s cuando tu salud baja más del 40% del máximo.

Incinerador.card_desc: [Bólido] La recarga de Bólido se reduce un {scale=0.6|0.6}.

Lanzar.card_desc: [Carga] Aumentas la distancia de Carga un {scale=12|12}%.

L\u00edder audaz.card_desc: [Armadura] Las eliminaciones reducen las recargas activas un {scale=10|10}%.

Llamas de Zeus.card_desc: [Escudo] Tu escudo tiene una duración infinita y la recarga se reduce en 2s.

Marca.card_desc: [Bólido] Golpear un enemigo con Bólido te cura {scale=100|100} PS

Miradas asesinas.card_desc: [Bólido] Al alcanzar a un enemigo con Bólido, recargas {scale=20|20} de munición.

Muro imponente.card_desc: [Escudo] Reduce la recarga de Escudo en {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Necesidad extrema.card_desc: [Escudo] Ganas un {scale=5|5}% de velocidad de movimiento al usar Escudo.

Objeto inamovible.card_desc: [Armadura] Si tienes menos de un 50 % de salud recibes un {scale=5|5}% aumento de curación de otros jugadores.

Persecuci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Bólido] Asestar un Bólido aumenta tu velocidad de movimiento un {scale=8|8}% durante 3 s.

Pira.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta tu capacidad máxima de munición en {scale=10|10}%.

Quemadura.card_desc: [Bólido] Bólido inflige un 45% más daño por cada subsecuente objetivo alcanzado después del primero.

Transmisor de calor.card_desc: [Escudo] Cada vez que tu escudo recibe 1000 puntos de daño, la recarga de Carga se reduce en {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

\u00daltima resistencia.card_desc: [Escudo] Mientras está activo, si te encuentras por debajo del 40 % de salud, te curas {scale=100|100} puntos de salud por segundo hasta llegar al 40 %.

Barreira Alta.card_desc: [Escudo] Reduz o intervalo do Escudo em {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Busca implac\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% sua velocidade de movimento por 3s ao atingir um inimigo com Bola de Fogo.

Carreira.card_desc: [Investida] Recebe {scale=10|10}% de velocidade de movimento por 3s após usar Investida.

Cavalheirismo.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta sua vida máxima base em {scale=150|150}.

Chamuscado.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Bola de Fogo causa 45% a mais de dano para cada alvo subsequente atingido após o primeiro.

\u00c9gide.card_desc: [Escudo] Seu Escudo tem duração infinita e o intervalo é reduzido em 2s.

For\u00e7a Impar\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Investida] Investida causa {scale=800|200} de repulsão no inimigo.

Formid\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Armadura] Regenera 55% da sua vida máxima durante 3s quando chega abaixo de 40% da sua vida máxima.

Incinerar.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Reduz o intervalo da Bola de Fogo em {scale=0.6|0.6}s

L\u00edder temer\u00e1rio.card_desc: [Armadura] Eliminações reduzem em {scale=10|10}% todos os intervalos ativos.

Marcar.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Atingir inimigos com a Bola de Fogo cura você em {scale=100|100} de vida

Necessidade Extrema.card_desc: [Escudo] Ganha {scale=5|5}% de velocidade de movimento enquanto estiver usando o Escudo.

Objeto Im\u00f3vel.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=5|5}% mais cura dos outros jogadores quando estiver abaixo de 50% de vida.

Olhar Mortal.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Atingir um inimigo com Bola de Fogo recarrega {scale=20|20}% da munição.

Pira.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=10|10} a sua capacidade máxima de munição.

Resist\u00eancia Final.card_desc: [Escudo] Enquanto o Escudo estiver ativo e a vida abaixo de 40%, você é curado em {scale=100|100} de vida por segundo até voltar a 40% de vida.

Transferir Calor.card_desc: [Escudo] Reduz o intervalo da Investida em {scale=0.5|0.5}s a cada 1000 de dano que o Escudo recebe.

Viagem Segura.card_desc: [Investida] Ganha um escudo de {scale=150|150} por 3s após usar Investida.

Voando Baixo.card_desc: [Investida] Aumenta em {scale=12|12}% a distância da Investida.

\u0411\u0435\u0437\u043e\u043f\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Рывок] После Рывка вы получаете Щит прочностью {scale=150|150} ед. на 3 с.

\u0412\u043e\u0437\u0432\u044b\u0448\u04.card_desc: [Осадный щит] Перезарядка щита сокращается на {scale=0.8|0.8} с.

\u0412\u044b\u0436\u0438\u0433\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Огненный шар наносит на 45% больше урона каждой следующей задетой цели.

\u0413\u0440\u043e\u043c\u0438\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 40% вы восстанавливаете 55% от его максимального запаса в течение 3 с.

\u0418\u0441\u043f\u0435\u043f\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Перезарядка Огненного шара сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} c.

\u041a\u0430\u0432\u0430\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное базовое здоровье увеличивается на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u041a\u043b\u0435\u0439\u043c\u043e.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Попадания по врагам Огненным шаром исцеляют вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041d\u0435\u043f\u043e\u0434\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 50% вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления от других игроков.

\u041e\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Щит] Скорость передвижения при использовании Щита увеличивается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u041e\u0442\u0432\u0430\u0436\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041f\u043e\u0433\u0440\u0435\u0431\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас увеличивается на {scale=10|10} ед.

\u041f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0435\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Щит] При уровне здоровья ниже 40% во время действия щита вы исцеляетесь {scale=100|100} каждую секунду, пока оно не достигнет 40%.

\u041f\u0440\u0435\u0441\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Попадание Огненным шаром увеличивает скорость передвижения на {scale=8|8}% на 3 с.

\u0421 \u0440\u0430\u0437\u0431\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Рывок] После Рывка скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u0422\u0435\u043f\u043b\u043e\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Щит] Каждые 1000 ед. урона, отраженные Щитом, сокращают перезарядку Рывка на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0423\u0431\u0438\u0439\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Попадание по врагу Огненным шаром восстанавливает {scale=20|20} ед. боеприпасов.

\u042d\u0433\u0438\u0434\u0430.card_desc: [Щит] Ваш щит действует бесконечно и восстанавливается на 2 с. быстрее.

Bezpieczna podr\u00f3\u017c.card_desc: [Szarża] Otrzymuje tarczę o wartości {scale=150|150} odporności na 3 s. po Szarży.

Egida.card_desc: [Tarcza] Tarcza ma nieskończony czas trwania, a czas odnowienia skraca się o 2 s.

Gor\u0105cy po\u015bcig.card_desc: [Kula ognia] Trafienie Kulą ognia zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 3 s.

G\u00f3ruj\u0105ca bariera.card_desc: [Tarcza] Redukuje czas odnowienia Tarczy o {scale=0.8|0.8} s.

Kawaler.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=150|150} PZ.

Kremacja.card_desc: [Kula ognia] Skraca czas odnowienia Kuli ognia o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Nadzwyczajny.card_desc: [Pancerz] Przywraca 55% maks. zdrowia przez 3 s, jeśli zdrowie spadnie poniżej 40% maks. wartości.

Niez\u0142omny lider.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Ostatni bastion.card_desc: [Tarcza] Gdy Tarcza jest aktywna, a poziom zdrowia wynosi mniej niż 40%, co sekundę odzyskuje {scale=100|100} PZ, aż do osiągnięcia 40% PZ.

Przewodzenie ciep\u0142a.card_desc: [Tarcza] Każde 1000 pkt. obrażeń przejętych przez tarczę skraca czas odnowienia Szarży o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Rozbieg.card_desc: [Szarża] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% przez 3 s po użyciu Szarży.

Spopielenie.card_desc: [Kula ognista] Kula ognista zadaje o 45% więcej obrażeń każdemu kolejnemu trafionemu celowi po pierwszym.

Unieruchomienie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Gdy zdrowie spada poniżej 50%, otrzymujesz o {scale=5|5}% więcej leczenia od innych graczy.

Wielka potrzeba.card_desc: [Tarcza] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=5|5}% podczas używania Tarczy.

Zab\u00f3jczy wzrok.card_desc: [Kula ognia] Trafienie wroga Kulą ognia odnawia {scale=20|20} szt. amunicji.

Znak.card_desc: [Kula ognia] Trafienie wrogów Kulą ognia przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ.

Damga.card_desc: [Ateş Topu] Ateş Topu ile bir düşmanı vurmak seni {scale=100|100} Can iyileştirir.

Di\u015fli.card_desc: [Zırh] Maksimum Can değerin %40'ın altına düştüğünde 3 sn içinde maksimum Canının %55'ini yenile.

G\u00fcvenli Yolculuk.card_desc: [Hücum] Hücum'dan sonraki 3 sn boyunca {scale=150|150} hasarlık bir Kalkan kazan.

H\u0131zl\u0131 Ba\u015flang\u0131\u00e7.card_desc: [Hücum] Hücum'u kullandıktan sonra 3 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Is\u0131 Aktar\u0131m\u0131.card_desc: [Kalkan] Kalkan'ının aldığı her 1000 hasar Hücum'un Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azaltır.

Kavur.card_desc: [Ateş Topu] Ateş Topu ilk vuruştan sonraki her vuruşta %45 daha fazla hasar verir.

Korkusuz Lider.card_desc: [Zırh] Saf dışı bırakmalar tüm aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azaltır.

Koruma.card_desc: [Kalkan] Kalkanın Süresizdir ve Bekleme Süresi 2 saniye azalır.

\u00d6ld\u00fcren Bak\u0131\u015flar.card_desc: [Ateş Topu] Bir düşmanı Ateş Topu'yla vurduğunda {scale=20|20} cephane dolar.
